 probiotic can help to improve your digestive health.

textbody.textstring:
Halfway through the day and need a tasty pick-me-up? Every Alpen 
 bar is cram packed with an abundance of delicious ingredients. 
 Delicious blueberries, creamy rolled oats and crunchy wholegrain 
 wheat flakes dipped and drizzled with a delicious yogurt flavour 
 coating! Hits the spot everytime!
Alpen Cereal Bars Blueberry & Cranberry with Yogurt

Since our first block was patted into shape over a century ago, we've 
 been churning butter for generations of 
 butter lovers. Anchor loved since 1886. For our anchor butter, we take the 
 best milk, churn it to perfection and add a little salt to bring out 
 its creaminess. By the way, our lovely cows are still free to roam around 
 (they like that).

All You Need! Ariel 3in1 PODS are the first 3-chamber detergent that \n clean, lift off stains and brighten!

Each 200ml serving provides: 34% of your RDA of calcium,110% of 
 your RDA of vitamin B12. MADE WITH COWS' MILK. GOOD FOR 
 HEALTHY TEETH + BONES. Trouble digesting milk? If drinking cows‘ 
 milk causes you symptoms such as nausea, stomach cramps, 
 bloating, gas and diarrhoea, this may be caused by the lactose in 
 milk and could mean that you are lactose intolerant.
